author: pamarcelot
msg: Added utility methods for adding/removing listeners (with checks for nullity of the widget and if the widget is disposed).

author: bsullivan
msg: Trinidad-2180 Deprecate invokeOnComponent in favor of visitTree

a partial visit using visitTree is always at least as fast as invokeOnComponent. In addition, for components controlling visiting, providing both invokeOnComponent and visitTree implementations is a source of errors. The solution is to:
2) Provide a default implementation in UIXComponent, calling visitTree to visit the clientId

author: chirino
msg: fixes APLO-120 : Add a --with-ssl option to the apollo create command to control if an SSL enabled configuration is created.
